tasks.task: Hosting and interviewing Uu Sbongilekele on the Farming Podcast
subtasks: Conducting an on-camera interview
Welcoming the guest and introducing their previous partnership
Exploring current farming business developments
Discussing the incubation program with African Women in Agriculture
Addressing the need for incubation and support for women farmers
Providing details on training, market access, and community impact
Addressing challenges such as land access and finance
Sharing insights on poultry incubation and future expansions
Promoting the I Am Citizen platform for networking and resource sharing
Encouraging aspiring farmers and sharing advice

tasks.task: Presenting success stories and promoting the incubation program
subtasks: Highlighting the networking achieved through the platform
Announcing replication plans in different regions
Discussing the future of the farming enterprise and community impact
Congratulating the guest on their award and acknowledging their contributions

tasks.task: Responding to questions and engaging with the audience
subtasks: Opening the floor for comments and questions from viewers
Addressing viewer inquiries related to the incubation program and platform
Sharing contact information for further engagement
Thanking the guest for their participation
Reminding viewers to like, share, comment, and subscribe
Mentioning upcoming topics and the overall purpose of the podcast
Outroing and signing off the show
